repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary: Commentary on the work attributed to Śaṅkara. Text and commentary in Sanskrit. This manuscript should logically have been attributed a shelfmark 'sanscrit' in the BnF collection.

support.p: Different types of papers: thiner for U1, f93-f95.

collation.desc: the front cover; verso bearing sticker Indien 500.
1 unfoliated/unpaginated front guard leaf; recto bearing Tam. 500 in black ink and Tamoul N° 500 in black pencil; verso blank.
2 unfoliated/unpaginated front guard leaves; blank recto verso.
95 ff; Tamil original pagination 1-129/unpaginated page/130-188 and parallel library Arabic library foliation 1-95.
2 unfoliated/unpaginated back guard leaves; blank recto verso.

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation. The binding is partly unbound.

additions.desc: Stamp SOCIÉTÉ ASIATIQUE DON COLLECTION ARIEL (U1, f1r).
Stamp BIBLIOTHÈQUE IMPÉRIALE MSS. (U1, f1r and f95r) and DON N° (U1, f1r).

binding.p: Leather (brown) covers; title SAONDARYALAHARI VYAKHYANAM and decoration on the spine.

origin.origDate: Earlier than 1855, since part of the bequest by Edouard Ariel (as attested by stamp on U1, f1r) to the Société Asiatique, received in 1855.

provenance.p: Owned by Edouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Edouard Ariel to Société Asiatique.

acquisition.p: Given in 1866 by the Société Asiatique.

listBibl.bibl: Saundaryalaharī 1958. Translated into English by W. Norman Brown. HOS 43.

body.p:
śrī-rāma-jayaṃ
saundaryya-laharī-vyākhyānaṃ
śivaś śaktyā yukto yadi bhavati śaktaḥ prabhavituṃ ‡ na ced evaṃ
devo na khalu kuśalas spanditum api ‡ Atas tvām ārādhyāṃ hari-hara
viriñcyādibhir api ‡ praṇantuṃ stotuṃ vā katham akṛta-punyaḥ
prabhavati ‡‡ {pcs} śivāḥ sarvva-maṃgaḷopetāh sadāśiva-tatvaṃ
vaśakāntāv ity asmād dhātoś śiva-śabdo [...]
